screen

Interface Touchable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tappable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuperTouchScreen

    public interface Touchable
extends Tappable
    A more complete interface with basic gestures Actually it's much more complicated

      • drag

        void drag(PhysicalPosition start,
          PhysicalPosition end)
        Move over surface without losing contact
        Parameters:
        start - initial position where gesture occurs
        end - final position where gesture occurs

      • rotate

        void rotate(PhysicalPosition center,
            double angle)
        Touch surface with two fingers and move them in a clockwise or counterclockwise direction
        Parameters:
        center - central position where gesture occurs
        angle - rotation angle od the gesture
